attributes.action: Provide financial support to the hospitality industry due to Chovid 19.
attributes.additional_details:
Advice from the government to avoids pubs combined with the recent suspension of flights means hotel occupancy and public house footfall is practically zero. 
Due to cash-flow pressures arising from labour/wages, suppliers, rents, utilities...the list goes on, businesses will not survive. 
The hospitality industry and pubs have overcome massive hurdles following the credit crunch. 
Support this industry and its jobs now, the same way banks and airlines are supported.
attributes.background: Following official advice to stay away from Pubs which can be taken to include hospitality venues. Provide financial support such as interest free loans or credit to help with cash flow pressures.
